In the last codeforces 307 div 2, problem D. One solutione is below, What that mean 

  if (((k >> i) & 1) == 0) res = res * fib % mod;
            else
                res = res * (pow2 - fib) % mod;

in this code.

long pow2 = fastPower(2, n);
        long fib = fibonacci(n + 1);
        long res = 1;
        for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
            if (((k >> i) & 1) == 0) res = res * fib % mod;
            else
                res = res * (pow2 - fib) % mod;
        if (res < 0) res += mod;
        System.out.println(res);
